## Setup

```{r}
library(DBI)
library(RSQLite)
library(dplyr)
library(lubridate)
library(stringr)
library(tibble)

# Create connection, read table
con = dbConnect(RSQLite::SQLite(), "data.sqlite")
dbJobs = as_tibble(dbReadTable(con, "jobs"))
```
